name: Anime Tiles Hop
description:
Anime Hop Ball game for Naruto, Boku no hero academia, Demon slayer, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, and all Anime fans
You’re looking for a piano game for Anime fans. Let’s download this game and enjoy incredible Anime songs.
Features:
Hold and drag control, easy to play
Breathtaking 3D effects
Unlimited Speed Run game.
Update Anime songs and Different backgrounds weekly
Amazing sound quality – music smooth with your finger
Game rules:
1. Touch, Hold and Drag to make the ball jump on the tiles.
2. Don't Miss the Tiles! And remember do not tap, this is not a tap tap game
3. Follow the rhythm of addictive challenges designed for each song.
4. Enjoy Anime songs, challenge your feeling, and your finger skills as speed increase in next round, and never stop
DISCLAIMER:
Anime Hop Ball is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by games or films management, or record label.
This app does not include any copyrighted material.
This app is for entertainment purposes only.
FEEDBACK:
Feel free to email us song requests, issues, comments, and suggestions, with your comments, we can add more songs and make better games ever! Thank you for download game! Have fun!
